plot: Six years after a devastating betrayal by the Hunter Society, Hunter X returns to seek revenge, not only for himself, but for his lost love Tiffany too.
title: Hunter X
plot_es: Six years after a devastating betrayal by the Hunter Society, Hunter X returns to seek revenge, not only for himself, but for his lost love Tiffany too.
plot_en: Six years after a devastating betrayal by the Hunter Society, Hunter X returns to seek revenge, not only for himself, but for his lost love Tiffany too.
